entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with rain in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 20 January 2023
